errors.checkpasswordMatch: Make sure your passphrase is the same in both passphrase boxes.
errors.emailAlreadyExists: An account with this email address has already been registered, consider using the 'Forgot passphrase' function.
errors.usernameAlreadyExists: An account with this username has already been registered, please try a different username.
errors.usernameInvalid: This username is not allowed; usernames must be between 2 and 24 characters long (inclusive), must start with a letter, and must contain only alphanumeric characters and underscores.

messages.inputEmailValid: The input is not valid E-mail
messages.usernameAlphanumeric: Username must contain only alphanumeric characters and underscores
messages.usernameMaxLength: Username must be no more than 24 characters long
messages.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 2 characters long
messages.usernameNoTwoUnderscores: Username must not contain two underscores next to each other
messages.usernameStartLetter: Username must start with a letter
